text:
FlashScan3D | Software Engineer | San Antonio, TX | ONSITE, $60k-$70k, www.flashscan3d.com

FlashScan3D is a startup company that is focused on developing 3D imaging devices. Headquartered in San Antonio, Texas, the company has quickly gained a reputation for innovation in the field of 3D imaging and its application to biometrics and forensic science applications.

We are looking for someone proficient in C++ or strong experience with another OO language and comfortable learning C++. Preferred qualifications include experience with, OOP, QT Framework, Python (Anaconda packages).
